RelatedSentence: TOKYO , May 19 ( IFR ) - Japanese government bond prices dipped slightly on Monday as the market geared up for new supply of superlong maturities , while a rise in U.S. Treasury yields on Friday also weighed on JGBs .
The Ministry of Finance will auction 1.2 trillion yen ( $ 11.8 billion ) of 20 - year JGBs on Tuesday .
